amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds made available in the bill for "improving public safety" to be spent on the construction or improvement of highways, streets or roads.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds made available in the bill for "improving public safety" to be spent on construction or improvement of highways, streets or roads.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt (NC) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 230 (Roll no. 120).
